films.title: The Last Light
films.description: Award-winning short film exploring themes of memory and identity in modern Singapore. A meditation on what we choose to remember and what we allow ourselves to forget.

films.title: Echoes of the Sea
films.description: Feature documentary exploring the changing relationship between coastal communities and the ocean. Filmed across 5 countries over 18 months.
awards: Official Selection — Asian Documentary Film Festival 2024

films.title: Kopitiam Stories
films.description: Narrative short set in a traditional Singaporean coffee shop, weaving together the lives of three generations of hawkers.

films.title: Silent Frequencies
films.description: Experimental narrative exploring communication and isolation in the digital age. Shot entirely on vintage anamorphic lenses.
awards: Jury Prize — Hong Kong Film Festival 2023

films.title: The Craftsmen
films.description: Documentary series profiling traditional craftspeople in Southeast Asia. Six episodes covering pottery, weaving, woodcarving, and more.
awards: Best Short Film — ASEAN Film Awards 2023

films.title: Neon Nights
films.description: Neo-noir narrative short set in the streets of Singapore's red-light district. A story of redemption and second chances.

films.title: Roots
films.description: Personal documentary tracing family history through three generations of immigrants. An intimate exploration of diaspora and belonging.

films.title: Tomorrow's Children
films.description: Sci-fi short film set in near-future Singapore, exploring themes of artificial intelligence and human connection.
